entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Pembroke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 p.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
